name: Don't be typical farang, know the right places!
description: I've noticed that most of the foreigners come to Thailand for the first time and just visits the typical tourists places, which is very informative  but c'mon I don't think you came here just to look at Temples and visit Floating Market ( or JJ market). I'll be honest, I'm not interested in being typical "tour guide", I'll rather be a friend or just a person who you would feel comfortable to be around so all of us can benefit from our "triip" :D
